mapper.select: select no, username, reg_date, convert_from(decrypt(decode(name, 'hex'), 'key', 'AES'), 'utf-8'), convert_from(decrypt(decode(birth_date, 'hex'), 'key', 'AES'), 'utf-8'), convert_from(decrypt(decode(home_number, 'hex'), 'key', 'AES'), 'utf-8'), convert_from(decrypt(decode(phone_number, 'hex'), 'key', 'AES'), 'utf-8'), convert_from(decrypt(decode(email, 'hex'), 'key', 'AES'), 'utf-8') from member where no = #{ value } and del_status = 'N';
